Instance Method# get()

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 6.0+tvOS 13.0+

```
func get() async -> Success
```

Available when `Success` conforms to `Sendable` and `Failure` is `Never`.Deprecated

get() has been replaced by .value
